representation_information.name: HD Photo, Version 1.0 (formerly Windows Media Photo)
representation_information.description: Format for continuous-tone still images that supports a wide range of features including: multiple color formats for display or print, fixed or floating point, high-dynamic-range image encoding, lossless or high-quality lossy compression, efficient decoding for multiple resolutions and sub-regions, and minimal overhead for format conversion or transformations during decoding.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
